casebody.data:
State
v.
Christopher Allen McKiver 213P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 6, 2016

Ms. Kimberly P. Hoppin, Attorney at Law, For McKiver, Christopher Allen.

Mr. Joseph E. Herrin, Mr. Daniel P. O'Brien Special Deputy Attorneys General, Mr. Ben R. David, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd of June 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of June 2016."
